scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Saint Christopher wading through a body of water, carrying the Christ Child on his shoulders. Saint Christopher, a large bearded man, uses a staff for support. The Christ Child, seated on his shoulders, points upwards. In the background, a figure on a rocky outcrop holds a lantern. Distant buildings, possibly a castle or town, are visible on the left bank. The overall scene represents the legend of Saint Christopher, a popular devotional image.
